Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute near 61st/Eberhart

Headline: Update: #94 California Temporary Reroute near 69th/Bell
ShortDescription: Update: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: Damen, Marquette, and Western; SB: Western, Marquette, and Damen due to, street blockage near 69th/Bell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 69th/Bell.

Northbound buses will operate via Damen, Marquette, and Western.

Southbound buses will operate via Western, Marquette, and Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 69th/Bell
ShortDescription: Update: 67 67th-69th-71st buses rerouted WB: 69th, Damen, Marquette, and Western; EB: Western, Marquette, Damen, and 69th due to, street blockage nr 69th/Bell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due tostreet blockage near 69th/Bell.

Westbound buses will operate via 69th, Damen, Marquette, and Western.

Eastbound buses will operate via Western, Marquette, Damen, and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Purple Line Express Service Delayed near Morse
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Purple Line Express trains are standing near Morse due to due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Purple Line Express trains are standing near Morse due to due to debris on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
